    2. CP violation in charmless B meson decays at the LHCb

    Lorenz Gaertner

    I am a theoretical and computational physicist interested in high energy physics, gravity and cosmology.

    CP violation in charmless B meson decays at the LHCb


    Following in the footsteps of the LHCb collaboration, I worked on a project to validate the discovered evidence for CP violation in charmless, B meson decays. I developed a data analysis framework using ROOT to analyse the experimental data obtained by the LHCb experiment and wrote a scientific report on my results. Additionally, I learned a lot about the general work-flow in modern particle physics.

    Updated: December 1, 2017
